org.apache.lucene.analysis.cn
Class ChineseFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream
      org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenFilter
          org.apache.lucene.analysis.cn.ChineseFilter

public final class ChineseFilter
extends TokenFilter

Title: ChineseFilter Description: Filter with a stop word table Rule: No digital is allowed. English word/token should larger than 1 character. One Chinese character as one Chinese word. TO DO: 1. Add Chinese stop words, such as ÓêÄ 2. Dictionary based Chinese word extraction 3. Intelligent Chinese word extraction Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company:

Version:
1.0
